mapper.insert: insert into tbl_program_info (PROGRAM_NAME, PROGRAM_NUMBER, MANAGE_USER_ID, PROGRAM_INTRO, PROGRAM_BACKGROUND, REMARK, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE) values (#{programName}, #{programNumber}, #{manageUserId}, #{programIntro}, #{programBackground}, #{remark}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdateBy}, #{lastUpdateDate})

insert into tbl_program_project (PROGRAM_ID, PROJECT_ID, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE) values (#{programId}, #{projectId}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdateBy}, #{lastUpdateDate})
mapper.select:
select distinct program.ID, program.PROGRAM_NAME, program.PROGRAM_NUMBER, program.MANAGE_USER_ID, user.USER_NAME manageUser from tbl_program_info program left join tbl_user_info user on user.ID = program.MANAGE_USER_ID left join tbl_program_project propro on propro.PROGRAM_ID = program.ID and propro.STATUS = 1 left join tbl_project_info project on project.ID = propro.PROJECT_ID and project.STATUS = 1 left join tbl_project_group tpg on tpg.PROJECT_ID = project.ID and tpg.STATUS = 1 left join tbl_project_group_user tpgu on tpgu.PROJECT_GROUP_ID = tpg.ID and tpgu.STATUS = 1
and (tpgu.USER_ID = #{uid} or program.CREATE_BY = #{uid} or program.MANAGE_USER_ID = #{uid})
and program.PROGRAM_NUMBER like concat("%",#{programInfo.programNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and program.PROGRAM_NAME like concat("%",#{programInfo.programName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and program.MANAGE_USER_ID = #{programInfo.manageUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and program.STATUS = 1
order by program.ID DESC limit #{start},#{rows}

select program.ID, program.PROGRAM_NAME, program.MANAGE_USER_ID, user.USER_NAME manageUser, program.PROGRAM_INTRO, program.PROGRAM_BACKGROUND, program.REMARK from tbl_program_info program left join tbl_user_info user on user.ID = program.MANAGE_USER_ID where program.ID = #{id}

select pro.ID id, pro.PROJECT_NAME projectName, pro.PROJECT_CODE projectCode, pro.PLAN_START_DATE planStartDate, pro.PLAN_END_DATE planEndDate, pro.DEPT_ID deptId, pro.PROJECT_STATUS projectStatus, dept.DEPT_NAME deptName from tbl_project_info pro left join tbl_program_project propro on propro.PROJECT_ID = pro.ID left join tbl_dept_info dept on dept.ID = pro.DEPT_ID and dept.`STATUS` = 1 where propro.PROGRAM_ID = #{id} and propro.`STATUS` = 1
mapper.update: update tbl_program_project set STATUS = 2 where PROGRAM_ID = #{id}
